basics.name: Davon Moss
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: ICS Student at UH Manoa, graduating 2021. Current Student Tech.

work.summary: Resource Maintenance, Technical Support, Web Administration
highlights: Update, reimage, maintain, and take inventory of COE machines.
Respond to and troubleshoot faculty and student hardware, software, and networking
Manage resource and classroom scheduler on website

volunteer.summary: Work with team to present a fictional, realistic case
highlights: Review case materials and form a strong argument in a short time
Present prepared arguments to court and effectively improvise counterpoints to opponent arguments
Communicate constantly with teammates to ensure consistant strategy
Coordinate fundraisers to pay for team trips to National competition

volunteer.organization: University of Guam Professional and International Programs
highlights: Coordinate field trips and mass excursions
Maintain reports of day-to-day incidents and communicate them to parents
Administer first-aid in emergency situations (CPR certified)
Communicate effectively with coworkers and parents

awards.title: Manoa Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who have a GPA of 3.5 or higher and an SAT score of 1280 or higher. Must maintain a 3.0 GPA to keep.

awards.title: Larry Bakko Professionalism and Civility Award
awards.awarder: Mock Trial National Competition - Hartford, Connecticut
awards.summary: Awarded to participants who exemplify professional qualities inside and outside of the courtroom. Winner chosen by MTNC Board and by vote of 49 other state representatives.
